author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Modernization of code:
   * part of the migration in #31061
   * part of #36404
  
Went systematically through all of the CMSDEPRECATED_X warnings in the  `OnlineDB/SiStrip*` packages from CMSSW_12_2_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2021-12-03-2300 and removed deprecated API calls.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

@quinnanm @robervalwalsh @mdelcourt  FYI
title: Modernize `OnlineDB/SiStrip*`
